alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 14 at 2:33PM CST until January 16 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Jackson and DeKalb counties. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible, and due to the presence of cold temperatures, hazardous travel conditions could persist into Monday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Locally heavier snowfall amounts may occur in snow bands that develop across the region. So, keep abreast of the latest forecast information as expected snowfall totals are likely to change.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
